input_text:
From: webinars@datasci.edu
Subject: Webinar Registration Confirmation

Thank you for registering!

Introduction to Machine Learning
Instructor: Prof. Robert Chen
Moderator: Emma Watson

Tuesday, February 10, 2025 | 2:00 PM - 3:30 PM UTC

Join online: https://webinar.example.com/ml-intro
Meeting ID: 987-654-321
Phone: +1-800-555-0199

Topics:
• 2:05 PM - What is Machine Learning? (20 min)
• 2:25 PM - Common ML Algorithms (30 min)
• 2:55 PM - Real-world Applications (20 min)
• 3:15 PM - Q&A Session (15 min)

Materials (slides and resource list) available after the session.

Capacity: 500 participants
Registration deadline: February 9, 2025

Session will be recorded and available to registered participants within 24 hours.

DataScience Academy

expected_json.special_instructions: Session will be recorded and available to registered participants within 24 hours.
